prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
Thanks for joining our live coverage on an extraordinary day in court, with adult-film star Stormy Daniels taking the stand.

It was a tense courtroom, with Daniels warned to dial back her comments at times. Prosecutors were also told to limit their questions regarding the salacious details of her alleged sexual encounter with Trump (which Trump has denied ever took place).

Here's our full wrap of what happened in court today.

This page was edited by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay and Phil McCausland. The writers were Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon, and we had Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein in court.

Court doesn't sit on Wednesday, so we'll be back on Thursday, when Stormy Daniels will once again take to the stand to continue her testimony.
stories:
We appreciate you participating in our live reporting of the court session, which saw adult film actress Stormy Daniels testifying on a remarkable day.

The atmosphere in the courtroom was tense, with Daniels being advised to watch her comments and prosecutors being instructed to avoid asking questions about the explicit details of her claimed affair with Trump, a matter that Trump has consistently denied.

Please find our complete summary of the day's court proceedings.

This page was edited by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay, and Phil McCausland, with Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon serving as the writers, and Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein reporting from the courtroom.

Since court is not in session on Wednesdays, we will resume our coverage on Thursday, when Stormy Daniels is set to resume her testimony.

We are grateful for your involvement in our coverage of the court hearing, where adult film star Stormy Daniels gave her testimony on a dramatic day. The courtroom was filled with tension, as Daniels was cautioned to be mindful of her statements and prosecutors were directed not to inquire about the specifics of her alleged affair with Trump, a topic that Trump has continually denied.

You can find our comprehensive report of the day's court developments.

This article was edited by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay, and Phil McCausland, with Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon as the writers, and Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein providing updates from the courtroom.

Since court is not in session on Wednesdays, our coverage will continue on Thursday, when Stormy Daniels is expected to continue her testimony.
